about_the_game:
Duel Corp. is a Souls-inspired action RPG with challenging directional combat that you can play either in co-op or alone. Unleash your individuality with an unrestricted class system and venture into a multi-faceted realm with an MMO feel, where a story and procedurally generated trials await you.

Key Features

  • Character Customization: Create a complex and unique class from a wide variety of weapons, armor, abilities, and talents tailored to your own play style. A stealthy rogue wielding a great axe and casting fireballs—anything is possible! Plus, personalize your avatar’s appearance to stand out.
  • MMO Feel: Discover a lively MMO-like world in the Hideout, where you can meet and interact with other players.
  • Multiplayer: Effortlessly take part in two-player co-op quests or competitive PvP - let the matchmaking feature seamlessly launch you into the action.
  • Direction-based Combat: Take part in intense, challenging and fluid direction-based combat scenarios. Sense of Learning, Mastering and Accomplishment
  • Procedural World: Explore a varied, interconnected, procedurally generated world full of secrets, unique items, allies and challenges. Find your own way to overcome obstacles by repurposing your learned skills.
  • Retro meets modern gaming: Immerse yourself in a unique pixel-art retro fantasy environment with high-definition 2D textures in modern and never-before-seen graphics full of surprises, twisted monsters and deadly bosses.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent violence, blood or gore.

name: Duel Corp.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated)
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Recommended resolution: at least 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated)
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Recommended resolution: at least 1280x720

short_description: A Souls-inspired action RPG with challenging directional combat that you can play either in co-op or alone. Unleash your individuality with an unrestricted class system and venture into a multi-faceted realm with an MMO feel, where a story and procedurally generated trials await you.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Turkish, Korean
